mapper.insert: INSERT INTO competition_athletes (competition_id, athlete_id, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{competitionId}, #{athleteId}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})

INSERT INTO competition_athletes (competition_id, athlete_id, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES

mapper.select: SELECT ca.*, a.name as athlete_name FROM competition_athletes ca LEFT JOIN athletes a ON ca.athlete_id = a.id WHERE ca.competition_id = #{competitionId} AND ca.athlete_id = #{athleteId}
SELECT ca.*, a.name as athlete_name FROM competition_athletes ca LEFT JOIN athletes a ON ca.athlete_id = a.id WHERE ca.competition_id = #{competitionId} ORDER BY ca.created_at ASC
SELECT ca.*, a.name as athlete_name FROM competition_athletes ca LEFT JOIN athletes a ON ca.athlete_id = a.id WHERE ca.athlete_id = #{athleteId} ORDER BY ca.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE competition_athletes SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
